channel.title: Judgment 718/742 - Economy - VPS Hosted - Staff Needed
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5282241/cooltext144533120468971.png[/img]
[B]Welcome to our thread! Judgment is aiming towards becoming one of the greatest community based economy servers out there! We care about our players and guarantee an easy and enjoyable experience for everyone! Our staff are here to help you stay informed and feel appreciated! The community is the biggest part of a server, not necessarily the content. However, Judgment is new and there is still a lot of work to be done. You can help us reach our goal by making suggestions! We are always looking to implement new features to our wonderful server! Thanks for reading and we hope to see you online soon![/B]
[B]Website:[/B] [url=http://www.judgmentrsps.com]Home[/url] (Still under construction)
[B]PLEASE UPDATE YOUR JAVA BEFORE DOWNLOADING, YOU MAY BLACKSCREEN WITHOUT A NEWER VERSION:[/B] http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jre8-downloads-2133155.html
[size=12pt]Client Blackscreening Fixed[/size]
[B]Download:[/B]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ttlqnzcpphe1d7d/Judgment.jar?dl=1
[img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5282227/JudgmentAd.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[b]Judgment Media: Constantly Updated[/b] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5252227/Client.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5253067/Home.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5242143/TPTab.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5243559/TriviaQ.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5242135/TriviaR.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5242144/ZombieMini.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5242137/GWE.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5242138/GW.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5242139/GWB.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5243839/PK.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5252225/particles.png[/img][/spoiler]
[B]Working on this thread as we speak, media is being added as well as more information![/B]

@darkdagger wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome to our thread! Judgment is aiming towards becoming one of the greatest community based economy servers out there! We care about our players and guarantee an easy and enjoyable experience for everyone! Our staff are here to help you stay informed and feel appreciated! The community is the biggest part of a server, not necessarily the content. However, Judgment is new and there is still a lot of work to be done. You can help us reach our goal by making suggestions! We are always looking to implement new features to our wonderful server! Thanks for reading and we hope to see you online soon!

Website: Home
